description:
The Billboard Awards are here yet again! In honor of the epic music event, let’s take a look back the best performances of all-time!公告牌音乐奖又来了！为了向这个史诗级音乐盛宴致敬，让我们一起来回顾一下有史以来最精彩的现场表演。

Rihanna & Britney Spears — ‘S&M’ (2011)雷安娜&布兰妮·斯皮尔斯《S&M》(2011)

Rihanna and Britney’s 2011 Billboard Awards performance? Yeah, it was pretty epic. Sexy doesn’t even begin to describe these two on stage. 雷安娜和布兰妮2011年的公告牌颁奖礼表演？对，那真是经典。性感已经不足以形容她们俩的表演了。

Jordin Sparks — ‘I Will Always Love You’ (2012)乔丁·斯帕克斯《I Will Always Love You》(2012)

If this song doesn’t instantly put you in tears, we don’t know what will. To honor the late Whitney Houston, Jordin belted out her biggest hit. It was magical.如果这首歌没有让你一听就哭出来，那我们就不知道还有什么能让你哭的了。为了向已故的惠特妮•休斯顿致敬，乔丁动情演唱了她的最热单曲。那真是像有魔力一样。

Katy Perry — ‘Wide Awake’ (2012)凯蒂·佩里《Wide Awake》(2012)

Katy knows how to put on a show! Years before she would perform at the Super Bowl, Katy showed off her amazing theatrics at the Billboard Music Awards.凯蒂真的很会表演！在到超级碗表演的许多年以前，她就已经在公告牌颁奖礼上展示了她震撼的舞台效果了。

N*SYNC — ‘Just Got Paid’ (2000)超级男孩《Just Got Paid》(2000)

If you need a throwback, this is the performance for you. In unforgettable multi-colored trench coats, the boy band performed on of their biggest hits. We’ll never get over it.如果你想看看更早期的表演，那这个表演很适合你。“超级男孩”组合穿着让人过目不忘的五颜六色大衣，表演了他们最热的歌曲。我们永远都不会忘记。

Nicki Minaj & Lil Wayne — ‘High School’ (2013)妮琪·米娜&李尔·韦恩《High School》(2013)

It’s time for some rap! Nicki and Lil Wayne are absolutely electric on stage. There’s no doubt about it!是时候来电说唱了！妮基和李尔•韦恩舞台上真能让你触电。不需要怀疑了！

Destiny’s Child — ‘Independent Woman/Say My Name/Jumpin’ Jumpin’ (2000)天命真女《Independent Woman/Say My Name/Jumpin’ Jumpin’》(2000)

Destiny’s Child is comprised of a heavenly trinity, so anytime the ladies hit the stage together, it’s absolutely incredible. This medley will undoubtedly go down as one of the most memorable BBMA performances in history!“天命真女”是一个天使一样的三人组合，所以她们每一次的表演都是无与伦比的。这个混音表演绝对会是历史上最让人难忘的公告牌颁奖礼表演之一。
